sentences.en: a bronze plate with gold ornamentation
A strip sewn or attached over or along an edge for protection, reinforcement, or ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 外衣边上为了装饰或加固而另加的一层布.

sentences.en: But they were used for ornamentation rather than as playthings.
sentences.cn: 但玩具屋只作装饰用,而不是玩具.

sentences.en: Enter the length of the ornamentation detail, from the bottom of the staircase.
sentences.cn: 输入装饰段的长度, 从楼梯底部开始计算.

sentences.en: General Merchandise Sector mainly manages commodities, small gifts small ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 小百货区主要经营各类日用小百货、小商品 、 小礼物、小饰品等.

sentences.en: Gifts Articles Beaded Neck, Wrist Ornamentation , Antique , Tribal, Stone Components.
sentences.cn: 采购产品礼品, 项链,手链, 古董, 石头装饰.

sentences.en: Instead they used them for ornamentation in everyday life.
sentences.cn: 相反他们在日常生活中用它们作为装饰品.

sentences.en: Mr. Sottsass was known for his playfulness and wit as well as his whimsical ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 索特萨斯不仅由于他设计中的顽皮机智也由于他装饰上的异想天开而出名.

sentences.en: Seeing it for the first time , Dunphy astounded byby the build ? ing � � s simplicity and lack of ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑宏伟朴素,装饰很少,邓菲初次看见, 不免感到惊讶.

sentences.en: Semi - precious stones were used for inlay ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 准宝石的石头用来做镶嵌装饰.

sentences.en: The chairs were comfortable, functional and free of ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 这些椅子舒适实用，而且看上去不显花哨。

sentences.en: The greater ornamentation, however, is reserved for entablature.
sentences.cn: 更大的纹饰, 不过, 是保留给口.

sentences.en: The ornamentation for the building is adopted from Notre - Dame de Reims in France.
sentences.cn: 在纹饰的建设是通过从圣母院兰斯在法国.

sentences.en: The ornamentation Vincent used to decorate his house at Christmas was very tasteful.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节期间,文森特家里使用的装饰品非常有品味.

sentences.en: The text , as of a book, distinct from illustrations or other ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 一本书前面简短的介绍性的短文.

sentences.en: Third floor of Yunfang Decoration plaza mainly manages all kinds of curtain, cabinet, housing ornamentation.
sentences.cn: 云纺装饰广场三楼主要经营各类窗帘 、 橱柜 、 家居饰品等商品.

words.tran_cn: 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品

trans.tran_en: decoration on an object that makes it look attractive
